content: description the foggy shores pullover combines a subtle stitch fade with a timeless oversized fit finished with ribbed cuffs and hem for comfort and style this design comes with a complete video tutorial for easy and relaxed making this pattern is free on my blog 1 there is a kit available with lion brand for this pattern 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your pullover + a free copy of the printable pdf pattern you can even customize your yarn color there is a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel for this pattern 3 this pattern was updated in 2025 with a readily available yarn previous versions yarn discontinued and video tutorial 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/foggy-shores-pullover-crochet-pattern-updated/ 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/yqxl4v 3 https //youtu be/krmyodehacs
